name: FlyBorg
description:
Like in FlyBorg, the financial markets can sometimes take you down. Learn to get-up again after a knock-out and progress in your financial journey!

FlyBorg is a fun game created by SwissBorg where you can earn real crypto!

Tournaments with rewards will be organised on a regular basis.

  • Make your best score on FlyBorg
  • Submit your score on twitter using the "Share" button in-game
  •  Share your score to increase the prize pot!* 1 point = 1 $CHSB token
  • Qualify in the top of the leaderboard to earn a prize!

 Head over to our Discord to learn more!

*Max one entry per player, only the best score is taken into consideration.
